Title: Visio: Edit legacy .vsd files in Visio for the web [Visio Plan 1, Plan 2]
Description:
Users with a Visio Plan 1 or Visio Plan 2 license will be able to edit legacy .vsd files in Visio for the web by creating an exact copy (except macros) and saving it in the latest .vsdx format.
GA date: March CY2024
